short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Neon Space Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Neon Space background. Neon Space wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically rotate Neon Space wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Set a random Neon Space theme or pin your favorite in the wallpaper customization panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Convenient links to your frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to quickly add and access favorite websites.
10. Fast links to Google applications.
11. Quick navigation to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Instant access to gaming portals.
15. Activate dynamic weather and seasonal animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the new Neon Space tab.
